Html:
HI stuhin,

Thank you for your posting!

Could you please be more specific on the question?   Do you mean the Many2Many relationship that we demostrated in the sampel CSEFEntityDataModel and VBEFEntityDataModel?  If so, I don't think we delete it in the new release.   You can find it in our latest release on Feb. 28th, http://cfx.codeplex.com/releases/. 

If you have any questions, please feel free to let me know.

Have a nice day!

Best Regards,
Michael

Hi Michael

The method of removal from the intermediate table through Linq2entity interests

Method Remove () works in EF4

Does not work in EF1

In your example many2many 2008 it are not present

Hi stuhin

Thank you so much!  For all the VS2008 samples, we will translate them into VS2010 version after VS2010 RTM is released.  If the features are changed in EF4, we will modify or improve our samples.  Thanks again for your posting.  If you are instered in EF4 new features, you will find several great samples in VS2010 folder of our release. 

If you have any questions or feedbacks, please feel free to tell us. 

Have a great day!

Best Regards,
Michael
